body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     A Photographic Journey of the Trail     A Photographic Journey - Pictures 1-15                 A Photographic Journey        Clockwise: (1) Olmos Basin Road Segment, Bexar County, Texas, (2) San José de los Corralitos, Zapata County, Texas, (3) Mission Nuestra Señora del Rosario de los Cujanes, Goliad County, Texas, (4) Mission Espada Aqueduct, Bexar County, Texas, (5) Rancho los Ojuelos, Webb County, Texas. title: El Camino Real de los Tejas National Historic Trail: A Photographic Journey - Pictures 1-15
